channel.title: Language-details on Martian
channel.description: Recent content in Language-details on Martian

item.title: Language Details
item.description: Symbols and Scope Symbols in Martian are identifiers for stages, pipelines, and parameters. They may comprise uppercase and lowercase letters, numeric digits, and underscores. A symbol may not begin with a numeric digit, which is reserved for number literals. The Martian lexer’s regular expression for symbols is [a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*\\b. Martian defines two scopes within which symbol names must be unique: Within the scope of one pipeline invocation, which encompasses all recursively included MRO files, no two stages or pipelines may share the same name.
